data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 30,272 believers in Guéra to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Guéra, Chad

data.prayer: Father, convict the 30,272 believers in Guéra to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Father, help the 30,272 believers in Guéra to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 385,628 lost friends and neighbors.
Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 30,272 believers in Guéra.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Bidio people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Guéra, Chad.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Guéra who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.section_summary:
the state of Guéra, Chad has a population of 415,900.

We estimate Guéra has 30,272 people who might know Jesus, 75,936 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 309,692 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Over 74.46 percent of the people of Guéra are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
